articles.author: Tara Copp, Samantha Schmidt, Dan Lamothe
articles.title: U.S. kills 3 in strike on alleged drug boat from Venezuela, Trump says - The Washington Post
articles.description: The president also signaled that his administration was preparing to take military action against Latin American cartels that move narcotics over land.
articles.content:
The U.S. military on Monday conducted a new attack on alleged drug smugglers from Venezuela, killing three people, President Donald Trump said on social media.
This morning, on my orders, U.S. milit… [+399 chars]
